name: Ada's Developers
description: Open-source technical opportunities within an agile team to prepare students for entering the tech industry.

name: Ada's Students
description: A collaborative space to organize mini-study groups, tutors, room-sitters, and crash courses.

name: Ada's Mentors
description: Mentoring underprivileged high school students lacking the confidence and exposure to university.

name: Ada's Podcast
description: A series aimed at enriching the experiences of university students amidst the current COVID-19 pandemic.
